post.title: Teknically Part 1: The 389 Day Laurier BBA
post.description: My first year as a BBA student at Wilfrid Laurier University was unlike anything imaginable. I started a business, travelled the world, and now I'm free.
post.excerpt: Today I declined my co-op offer. Last week, I deferred all my classes. My time as a full time BBA student at Wilfrid Laurier University is…
